name: Madness (itch) (Fiki Abdul Rachman)
description:
STORY

Tells about a vlogger who is curious about an old building, he enters an old building until he forgets that the exit door is locked and cannot be opened, to get out of the building the player must find a way to get out, but in the building there is "something" trying to block players from leaving.

How did he get out of the old building? will he make it out alive?

GAME CONTROL : 

[W A S D} - Move around 

[Mouse] - Player look around
